olatile potions of transformation were magic potion that received a recreational use in the 15 century DR.
Volatile potions of transformation possessed magics that altered the imbibers appearance for a short period of time, seemingly at random. Among the forms the potion resulted in were various animal forms, such as wolves, pigs, or chickens.
These volatile potions were consumed recreationally during the annual celebration of the Masquerade of Liars in the city of Neverwinter as early as of the mid-to-late 15 century DR.
